name: EMPTY STAR
description:
DESCRIPTION:
Astronaut Ben Tornsey falls alone into a Black Hole.
Navigate the void and find an escape.
A short third person adventure game developed for the Epic Mega Jam 2020.

INSTRUCTIONS:
WASD or Left Joystick to move.
Mouse of Right Joystick to turn camera.
Left Shift/ctrl or Triggers for pitch.

Subtitles will be available soon.

TECHNICAL BREAKDOWN:

Engine:
Unreal Engine 4

Assets used:
Character models: iClone Character Creator with Headshot Plugin along with iClone 7 and the Faceware plugin.

Crewmate clothing made in Marvellous Designer before Jam and textured in Substance Painter.
Astronaut suit by JUAN IGNACIO: https://blendswap.com/blend/12622
Astronaut suit was editied in Blender and retextured in Substance Painter during the Jam.
Explosion Builder by W3 Studios.
Amplify LUT Pack by Amplify Creations used for colour grading.
Font "Nasalization" from dafont https://www.dafont.com/nasalization.font?l[]=10&l[]=1

Audio samples used from the Cymatics - Hearts Charity Sample Pack.

The game is based off of the Unreal Third person template with character animations created using Control Rig.
